description:
This is a clip from yesterday's podcast release with Gregg Hurwitz. In it, he and Dr. Peterson discuss the necessity of transparent algorithms and conscious regulation as we move forward into the hyper-digital age.

Unlock the ad-free experience of The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast and dive into exclusive bonus content on DailyWire+. Start watching now: http://dwpluspeterson.com/yt
